column1: Building and Infrastructure Information Modelling (BIM) for Smart Engineering - MSc
column5: Why study this courseThis MSc will provide you with the necessary training, skills and hands-on experience to become successful in the dynamic and highly competitive fields of BIM and smart engineering.Our MSc Building and Infrastructure Information Modelling (BIM) for Smart Engineering aims to provide you with the necessary training, skills and hands-on experience to become successful in the dynamic and highly competitive fields of BIM and smart engineering, and to give you a distinct edge when applying for a career in industry or for a PhD studentship.
column7: For programme fees please visit our website: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
